item.title: Armenia
item.description: Yerevan Food Rehan Restaurant Nice outdoor seating Western Armenian / Lebanese Taboule Restaurant or Shaghig Yerevan Two good Lebanese spots right next to each other Zeituna Home Of Food Syrian Lahmajun Gaidz Dolmama - Armenia’s Restaurant Fine dining with good dolma Cafe Ոչ Լույս Ոչ Մութ Hayk Coffee Roasters Lumen Coffee Mirzoyan Library Bars Esthetic Joys Embassy / ПЭУ Hip spot with outdoor seating and indoor DJs Misc Cone Nice store with craft goods Sergei Paradjanov Museum Vernisaj Gyumri Food gwoog gastrohouse Traditional Armenian dishes Call a day in advance to get a full cow head Definitely order the panrkhash Նոր Հալեպ Cafe Aregak Bakery and Café Vanadzor Food Sajj Terouh Sette Lebanese family serving amazing food with homemade cheese!

item.title: France
item.description: Paris Food Mokonuts One of my favorite restuarants in the world. Innovitive, homemade style food cooked with French, Middle Eastern, American and Japanese flavors run by a cool couple.

item.title: Japan
item.description: I haven’t been to Japan in a while so a lot of them are recommendations from others that I trust.

item.title: Los Angeles
item.description: Food Anajak Thai Cuisine Green whole fish dish is amazing! Tire Shop Taqueria Exactly what it sounds like.

item.title: New York
item.description: Manhattan Food Cervo’s Wine bar style excellent seafood One of my favorites. Kopitiam Causal Malaysian spot with amazing pandan dessert!

item.title: Taiwan
item.description: Taipei Food San Jiao Bing Small shop serving shaved ice and transitional dessert soups. This was the best dessert I had in Taiwan.
